name: Annexed
description:
Checker style game, where to move you need to combine with the checker beside you to  reach the next tile, until the red one. Every move decreases checker count as it moves 2 checkers to a new position - combining them. Complete in least possible moves to get perfect score. Think Ahead!

This game as well as soundtrack was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 in a week. I plan to release this game to Google Play with new levels and features like level editor and solutions after the jam ends.
